org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer

Class ConsumerRecord<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecord<K,V>

  • public final class ConsumerRecord<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
    A key/value pair to be received from Kafka. This consists of a topic name and a partition number, from which the record is being received and an offset that points to the record in a Kafka partition.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConsumerRecord(java.lang.String topic, int partition, long offset, K key, V value)
      Create a record with no key
